page.title: 02SCOUTS AND GUIDES
page.content: {SCOUTS (cont.) The meetings consist of things like lighting fires, learning knots and lashings ,how to pitch a tent, playing games, passing badges.Also about once every two months we have a wide game which is where you do various things around the village like finding objects and returning them to base without getting caught by other scouts Once a year we have camp which lasts for a week.In the past we have been to Barnard Castle,Ford Castle,Lake Windermere and this year we are going to Yorkshire near the Settle Carlisle railway.Apart from this we also go off camping in our patrols. {GUIDES} 1st Wylam guides is run by Lucy Monroe ,Carolyn Hawkes and Julia Koerner.The sub per week is 20 pence.
